casebody.data:
CABARRUS COUNTY BOARD OF EDUCATION
v.
DEPARTMENT OF STATE TREASURER, et al. 369PA18-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 9, 2019 Blake W. Thomas, Deputy General Counsel, for Department of State Treasurer, et al. Matthew W. Sawchak, Solicitor General, for Department of State Treasurer, et al. Michael Crowell, Attorney at Law, for Cabarrus County Board of Education. Deborah R. Stagner, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Cabarrus County Board of Education. Elizabeth L. Troutman, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for N.C. School Boards Association. Jill R. Wilson, Attorney at Law, Greensboro, for N.C. School Boards Association. Allison B. Schafer, Legal Counsel/Director of Policy, for N.C. School Boards Association. Ryan Y. Park, Deputy Solicitor General, for Department of State Treasurer, et al. Joseph A. Newsome, Attorney at Law, Raleigh, for Department of State Treasurer, et al. Lindsey V. Smith, Attorney at Law, for Cabarrus County Board of Education.

The following order has been entered on the Motion for Extension of Time to File Reply Brief filed on the 8th of August 2019 by Respondents:

"Motion Allowed by order of the Court in conference, this the 9th of August 2019."

Respondents shall have up to and including the 9th day of September 2019 to file and serve his/ her brief with this Court.
